DataElement.preferredName: Taper Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Intervention Begin Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the event began date related to cease by degrees to alter the course of a disease in a patient that involves the transplantation of hematopoietic stem cells from a donor to a patient with a myeloid or lymphocytic malignancy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to cease by degrees to alter the course of a disease in a patient that involves the transplantation of hematopoietic stem cells from a donor to a patient with a myeloid or lymphocytic malignancy.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: To cease by degrees; decrease; diminish.

Concepts.definition: To cease by degrees; decrease; diminish.

Property.preferredName: Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Intervention or Procedure
Property.preferredDefinition: A therapeutic procedure that involves the transplantation of hematopoietic stem cells from a donor to a patient with a myeloid or lymphocytic malignancy.:An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

Concepts.definition: A therapeutic procedure that involves the transplantation of hematopoietic stem cells, either with the patient as their own donor or from a donor to a patient. This can be used for treatment of malignant and non-malignant diseases.

An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation or an event began.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

DataElement.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
